data.lyric:
[ti:my future]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:my future]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]my future - Billie Eilish
[00:01.52]Lyrics by：Finneas O'Connell/Billie Eilish O'Connell
[00:03.04]Composed by：Finneas O'Connell/Billie Eilish O'Connell
[00:04.56]I can't seem to focus
[00:08.91]And you don't seem to notice
[00:12.97]I'm not here
[00:17.06]I'm just a mirror
[00:22.80]You check your complexion
[00:27.23]To find your reflection's all alone
[00:35.26]I had to go
[00:41.45]Can't you hear me
[00:46.13]I'm not comin' home
[00:52.53]Do you understand
[00:56.86]I've changed my plans
[01:01.61]'Cause I I'm in love
[01:10.17]With my future
[01:14.15]Can't wait to meet her
[01:20.00]And I I I'm in love
[01:28.39]But not with anybody else
[01:32.74]Just wanna get to know myself
[01:43.68]I know supposedly I'm lonely now
[01:46.82]Lonely now
[01:48.39]Know I'm supposed to be unhappy
[01:51.11]Without someone
[01:53.30]Someone
[01:55.39]But aren't I someone
[01:57.84]Aren't I someone
[02:00.65]Yeah
[02:01.70]I'd I'd like to be your answer
[02:11.53]Be your answer
[02:13.80]'Cause you're so handsome
[02:15.45]You're so handsome
[02:19.63]But I know better
[02:24.42]Than to drive you home
[02:30.68]'Cause you'd invite me in
[02:35.16]And I'd be yours again
[02:39.87]But I I I'm in love
[02:45.61]Love love love love
[02:48.43]With my future
[02:52.43]And you don't know her
[02:58.30]And I I'm in love
[03:04.29]Love love
[03:06.58]But not with anybody here
[03:11.15]I'll see you in a couple years
data.trans:
[ti:my future]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:my future]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.52]//
[00:03.04]//
[00:04.56]我好像无法集中精力
[00:08.91]而你似乎丝毫没有察觉
[00:12.97]我并不在这里
[00:17.06]我已化作一面明镜
[00:22.80]你对着我整理仪容
[00:27.23]却发现了镜中总是孤单的自己
[00:35.26]我必须离开
[00:41.45]你听不见吗
[00:46.13]我不会再躲回家里
[00:52.53]你明白吗
[00:56.86]我已经改变了计划
[01:01.61]因为我 我坠入了爱河
[01:10.17]与我的未来相恋
[01:14.15]我等不及要与她邂逅
[01:20.00]而我 我坠入了爱河
[01:28.39]但不是爱上了别的谁
[01:32.74]我只想对自己多一些了解
[01:43.68]我知道我可能形单影只
[01:46.82]孤立无援
[01:48.39]知道我应该郁郁寡欢
[01:51.11]因为无人相伴
[01:53.30]那个人
[01:55.39]但那个人为何不能是我自己
[01:57.84]我为何不能陪伴着自己
[02:00.65]//
[02:01.70]我愿意 我愿意成为你的答案
[02:11.53]回应你的爱
[02:13.80]因为你是如此英俊潇洒
[02:15.45]你的外表这样夺目耀眼
[02:19.63]但我知道最好
[02:24.42]不要开车载你回家
[02:30.68]因为你会把我请进门
[02:35.16]我又会再次为你沦陷
[02:39.87]但我 我坠入了爱河
[02:45.61]爱河 爱河 爱河 爱河
[02:48.43]与我的未来相恋
[02:52.43]你对她一无所知
[02:58.30]而我 我坠入了爱河
[03:04.29]爱河 爱河
[03:06.58]但我爱上的不是某个人
[03:11.15]我会在几年后再与你相见
